byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Reports had simmered for weeks that Brig. Gen. Rustom Ghazali had been severely beaten in an internal government dispute.

headline.print_headline: Syria Remains Silent on Intelligence Official’s Death
headline.main: Syria Remains Silent on Intelligence Official’s Death

snippet: Reports had simmered for weeks that Brig. Gen. Rustom Ghazali had been severely beaten in an internal government dispute.
abstract: Syrian intelligence official Brig Gen Rustom Ghazali is reported dead, possibly as result of rifts in country's power structure; cause of death is unclear, but it is thought that he was severely beaten by guards at office of rival General Rafiq Shehadeh.
